616510.name: Fantasy Grounds - Heroic Characters 12 (Token Pack)
616510.description:
Heroic Characters 12

This token pack contains 27 tokens. This pack contains more heroic characters.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Female Aasimar Paladin
  • Female Aasimar Rogue
  • Female Aasimar Warrior
  • Female Human Druid
  • Female Human Fighter
  • Female Human Knight
  • Female Human Monk
  • Female Human Nature Wizard
  • Female Human Ranger
  • Female Human Scout
  • Male Human Bandit
  • Male Human Battle Mage
  • Male Human Commander
  • Male Human Dark Knight
  • Male Human Dark Fighter
  • Male Human Druid
  • Male Human Fighter
  • Male Human Monk
  • Male Human Paladin Captain
  • Male Human Ranger
  • Male Human Rogue Mage
  • Male Human Scout
  • 2 Male Human Sorcerers
  • Male Human Stalker
  • Male Human Striker
  • Male Human Wolf Barbarian
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
